newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egyptian pound/dollar rate generally unchanged.
newsitem.headline: Egyptian pound/dollar rate generally unchanged.

text.p: The Egyptian pound against the dollar moved sideways in the private sector market on Wednesday as cash inflows neutralised downward pressures from unusually large public sector dollar demand, bankers said.
But some said liquidity in the market could tip the balance anytime.
One of them attributed the large public sector demand to the fact that the end of the financial year, June 30, was nearing.
Private-sector Egyptian banks said the dollar ranged from 3.3925 to 3.3950 pounds bid and 3.3935 and 3.3970 pounds offered in the interbank market.
A survey of five actively trading banks gave average rates of 3.3939 bid and 3.3956 offered compared to 3.3941 bid and 3.3958 offered on Tuesday.
The Central Bank calculated the average exchange rate at midday as 3.390865 buy and 3.397974 sell.
